name: Animal
starring: Ranbir Kapoor, Anil Kapoor, and Bobby Deol
desc: The hardened son of a powerful industrialist returns home after years abroad and vows to take bloody revenge on those threatening his father's life

name: Do patti
starring: Kajol, Kriti Sanon, and Shaheer Sheikh
desc: A puzzling investigation leads a no-nonsense cop down a dark path involving the vicious rivalry between twin sisters and the volatile man they both love

name: Khel Khel Mein
starring: Akshay Kumar, Taapsee Pannu, and Vaani Kapoor
desc: An unhappily married couple and five friends decide to share every call or text they get over one night with each other. There's nothing to hide — right?

name: Our Little Secret
starring: indsay Lohan, Ian Harding, and Kristin Chenoweth
desc: After discovering their significant others are siblings, two resentful exes must spend Christmas under one roof — while hiding their romantic history.

name: Sikander Ka Muqaddar
starring: Avinash Tiwary, Jimmy Shergill, and Tamannaah Bhatia
desc: After an unsolved diamond heist, a hard-nosed cop’s pursuit of his key suspect turns into obsession, until they finally face each other — and the truth.

name: Fighter
starring: Hrithik Roshan, Deepika Padukone, and Anil Kapoor
desc: A reckless yet brilliant squadron leader and his team of elite fighter pilots face mortal dangers and inner demons as they unite for a deadly mission

name: Maharaja
starring: Vijay Sethupathi, Anurag Kashyap, and Mamtha Mohandas
desc: When his prized possession gets stolen, a barber seeks help from the police, who jeer at his request — until they learn what they're really looking for.

name: spellbound
starring: Rachel Zegler, John Lithgow, and Jenifer Lewis
desc: When a powerful spell turns her parents into giant monsters, a teenage princess must journey into the wild to reverse the curse before it's too late.

name: The Monkey King
starring: Jimmy O. Yang, Bowen Yang, and Jolie Hoang-Rappaport
desc: A stick-wielding monkey teams with a young girl on an epic quest for immortality, battling demons, dragons, gods — and his own ego — along the way.
